item.title: Azure Storage Blobs
item.description:
Here’s my first post. I just need some content in here so here it goes. This is basic usage of blob storage accounts on Azure.

Why use this?

Thinking of using one for static site serving or just to host all my public images to be able to share them across multiple platforms. It is also fairly affordable.
